p:
Bacterial strains included Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) (a clinical isolate from a patient with burn wounds at Nemazee Hospital, Shiraz, Iran), Enterococcus faecalis (ATCC 29212), Acinetobacter baumannii (NCTC 13304), Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853),
Klebsiella pneumoniae (ATCC 700603), and Serratia marcescens (ATCC BAA2808).
